title: On Standby is a piece of sound art “based on data collected...
content:
On Standby is a piece of sound art ‚Äúbased on data collected by seven different people in Malm√∂, Sweden. Each of those people used a smart plug to collect data on the energy consumption of a device in their home over the course of a single night‚Äù.
